attributes.additional_details:
Due to the mass amounts of taxes paid from each working member of the public, animals are essential treatment for many mental health illnesses, even supporting the elderly with company.

Dogs are humans best friends even through history, we should atleast be able to help them as much as they help us.
Making dogs health part of the National Health Service.

Dogs/cats are family members and should be entitled to live the best quality of life possible.
attributes.background:
Free healthcare provided to pets.
Pets health is dependent on extortionate rates that most households struggle to afford.

Health care is only provided to those on JSA,UC,DLA.
 Working household's pay taxes that should cover animal healthcare.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581142
